First strike
[i]Bushido[/i].– Whenever Ryoma, Prince of Hoshido becomes blocked, it deals damage equal to its power to target opponent.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Ryoma attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, draw a card, create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token and gain 3 life.
Partner with Xander, Prince of Nohr
